actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Minimum Wage Act so as to enable airline employees to exchange days at regular rates of compensation.

summary.text: Provides, under the District of Columbia Minimum Wage Act, that airline employees may exchange days at regular rates of compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Minimum Wage Act so as to enable airline employees to exchange days at regular rates of compensation.
